properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm; Waters from Pt. St. George to Cape Mendocino CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 18 at 2:49AM PST until February 19 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 8
to 10 feet at 9 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Pt St George to Cape Mendocino 10 to 60 nm and Cape
Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to the steep seas a northwest
swell of 5 feet at 13 seconds is moving through the waters.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING
